name: Drift Maniac
description:
Hey Guys, I have created an Endless infinite runner 3D Game using Unity and Blender for Winter GameJam Competition.  It took me almost 7 days to complete the project during my Midsem Holidays. 

External Help:

Character: The Zoro Model was completely made by me during the Secy Specialization Project and thus was used here. Along with it, the Running, walking, and Jumping animations were also made by me however the rolling animation was imported through the Mixamo website.

Environment: The models such as roads, (2 types of) walls, books, laptops, streetlights, cones, blockages, etc. were completely made by me. However, bicycle and computer model was imported.

Sound, Images, Materials, and Textures were imported from google.

Bugs:

I am aware that there are lots of bugs and I am sure I will get rid of them as soon as I get the time.

Thank You.
